website_summaries.verdict: The speed on these skates will not disappoint. They are made well enough for the pros, but are still affordable.
pros: Comes with decent quality indoor wheels
Hook-and-loop secured cover completely covers laces for a secure wear
Attractive skates that look and perform impressively right out of the box
Made with leather accents on denim for the upper
cons: This is a heavy duty skate that is comfortable, but will require a break-in period for best performance

customer_reviews.title: All the kids love these
customer_reviews.text: These are the best speed skates around. Don’t know why they’ve gone up $20 since our purchase, we got them for $199. I learned I could order through our rink for less and purchased my daughter’s vnla mint jam skates for a good discount. Will know to check there before purchasing when the kids outgrow these. While mechanically sound, I do wish they didn’t scuff so easily. These don’t stay pretty for long but it is a very solid skate otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Pen name

customer_reviews.title: Was not a new pair of skates!
customer_reviews.text: These skates were obviously not new. The box was open, skates not in the bags, wheels scuffed, and back of one skate damaged. I'll reorder them as I've had good transactions with this company before. Very disappointed right now.
customer_reviews.author: Momofteens

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of skates
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of Skates. This is my first pair of VNLA skates and I was happy with the purchase. They look great and skate great right out of the box. The only adjustment I made was that I tightened the trucks a bit, but that is just my preference.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brookins

customer_reviews.title: Love these skates!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pair of roller skates since childhood. They were comfy right out of the box. I bought a set of outdoor wheels and a second set of bearings so I can just switch out the outdoor and indoor wheels depending on where I'm skating. Great pair of starter skates...but I plan on skating on these for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: I love these skates. They’re even pretty comfy. I recently just switched to these kind from rollerblades.. I ordered them to fit snug. They ride so smooth. DONT FORGET TO CHECK and/or TIGHTEN WHEELS BEFORE USE!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Stealth’s!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these looking to get back into skating after 19 years. I liked the look and seem to have good reviews. Growing up I used Riedell speed skates and they were great. I wanted speed skates and a pair that didn’t break the bank. I think these Stealth’s are it. They look great and are really comfortable. I wear and 11 shoe and their size 11 is perfect. Packaging was great as well. After a short period skating with them around the house and after a few adjustments. I had them set perfectly for me. Will be hitting the rink this week!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: They look awesome and feel great can't wait to hit the rink ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got them in today. Wasn't sure about sizing, went with 8m (I wear 8.5m shoe) and they fit perfectly. They look awesome and feel great can't wait to hit the rink in them.
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. As a previous speed skater I was impressed. I had not been a pair of skates for 20 years and I loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I used to jamskate pretty regularly, and spent tons of money on skates growing up. I was skeptical buying these to get back into skating, but I am pleasantly surprised at the build quality and comfort of these. The denim boot is odd, but it works. Make sure to adjust the play of the wheel nuts when you get them, and tighten axle bolts as needed and these will last years.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a half size, get the size above Your size.
customer_reviews.text: The skates are great , they’re comfortable, and I have no complaints about them so far .im a size 9.5 in shoes, I got the skates in a 10 and they fit perfectly . Only difference I seen was that the toe plug on my skates didn’t have that diamond shape as seen in the picture , so it doesn’t look as cool but I don’t think that’s enough for me to make the skates a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Aramis Rivera

customer_reviews.title: bearing problems
customer_reviews.text: bearings went bad and stopped my wheels from spinning causing me to fall twice also messing up the front of my left skate i only had them 2 weeks i am not satisfied with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for jammin'
customer_reviews.text: Great roller skates. If you are looking for skates that are for tricks , these are the ones. They are very sensitive to movement, so keep that in mind. That means they react quickly to your movement.
customer_reviews.author: John Mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking skates
customer_reviews.text: Great skates for the price. Nice looking skates. Frays quickly after wearing all around the stitching (probably after 1-2 times wearing). Not too easy to get on & off though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I skate at least once a week. I ordered these bc i saw a lot of people skating on them and they said they were good for the price. I tried them on and the material on the heal was rubbing into my skin making them very uncomfortable. I skated around the rink a few times on them and just couldn't get used to them. Sent them back. So if you have the patience to get used to skating all over again and want a cheap skate then they are right for you!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna shellenberger

customer_reviews.title: Skates
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves these! She has been wanting some VNLA skates for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: kgreen

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is garbage .
customer_reviews.text: First off you can clearly see in the pictures that these skates dont look the same. If I'm going to pay full price I want them to be almost perfect. The wheels were printed on the wrong side. The bearings make noise.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla stealth skates
customer_reviews.text: I love my vanilla's the stealth line is so awesome looking. I haven't had any issues with them except that my son keeps stealing them & I wear his tuxedos . I don't mind at all both are really slick skates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality VNLA Skates
customer_reviews.text: Great skates!!! My son and his friend got a pair for Christmas. They go skating once a week for at least 10 hours. Very comfortable and safe!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality !
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Grandson but my daughter-in-law loves them too ! She wants her own pair !
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Feels like I'm skating on a cloud! More comfortable than my Brooks sneakers, :-0 lol!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, they fit perfectly, can't wait to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ann Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Now I’m the cool kid at the rink!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new skates! The gray denim and black look so good. The wheels are fast, cushions are great. Just had to get a toe stopper which was no problem to swap out.
customer_reviews.author: AZinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Quality skates
customer_reviews.text: Still using after a year of almost every day use. Had to replace the insole but still fits nicely
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Happy Skater
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our son, they were a little pricey but very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Burrow

customer_reviews.title: Great skate
customer_reviews.text: Fit great only complaint is a chuck keeps coming loose and the toe is already peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Perkins

customer_reviews.title: One slight issue
customer_reviews.text: These skates are beautiful and sooo smooth my only issue is I have only worn them twice and the cushion already exploded so now I have to buy new ones
customer_reviews.author: Rudy bruce

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 year old daughter for Christmas. All her friends have this brand as well. They are great. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: april brown

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these skates again.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box ready. A few adjustment to get the skates to the right tension for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ez Ridn

customer_reviews.title: Amazon delivery promise is spot on!!
customer_reviews.text: Xmas present for my granddaughter. She loved them. Everything was great from the item to the delivery! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time to JAM!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect right out of the box. Great fit and a great look.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth rolling!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth gliding roller skates. Best skates I've owned so far.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald A Granberry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort and flexibility of the skates movement. Wheels are great and has a smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: He's had these skates before but buying them on Amazon made it easy peasy!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to shoe size for men.
customer_reviews.text: They look great! Ready to go straight out of the box, just lace them up and put them on.
customer_reviews.author: SDavis

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a size down just like I rent skates at the rink
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size down just like I rent skates at the rink. They fit great and skate even better. I'm in love 💛
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: One of my stop plogs didn't came. Thats ridiculous so mad!!
customer_reviews.author: Javier d.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for a 14 year old. She loves them! I tried them on too and want a pair. Very comfortable, top knotch.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey pinkham

product_meta.title: VNLA Stealth Jam Skate Mens & Womens Skates - Roller Skates for Women & Men - Adjustable Roller Skate/Rollerskates - Outdoor & Indoor Adult Skate - Kid/Kids Skates (Grey/Black)
feature_bullets: JAM INDOORS - The VNLA Stealth Jam skates come with Vanilla Backspin Stealth (62mm, 93A hardness) indoor wheels. Get a second set of outdoor wheels and jam anywhere!
SKATE LIKE A PRO - VNLA Jam quad roller skates come with Vanilla Gorilla, a nylon plate with upgraded aluminum trucks (micro-adjustable lock nut/washer and 8mm axles).

PREMIUM SKATING - Get the most out of your time on wheels with the improved softness and durability of the Vanilla Boot. Add a touch of sleek style with the matte black color scheme of the tough denim and leather exterior.
NO BREAK-IN TIME - VNLA Stealth skates require little to no break-in period. Strap them on, and you are ready to enjoy skating, pain-free.
WICKED FAST - From quick turning to speed skating, the Vanilla ABEC-9 bearings and premium frame provide 5-degree action for increased stability and the versatility to skate without restrictions.
